New,monospace;font-size:12px;border-radius:10px;padding:15px;margin:0;word-break:normal;display:block;overflow-x:auto;color:#4ec9b0;background:#282c34&#125;.markdown-body a&#123;text-decoration:none;color:#409eff;border-bottom:1px solid #409eff&#125;.markdown-body a:active,.markdown-body a:hover&#123;color:#007bff;border-bottom:1px solid #007bff&#125;.markdown-body 7px;line-height:24px&#125;.markdown-body td&#123;min-width:120px&#125;.markdown-body blockquote&#123;position:relative;padding:8px 26px;background-color:rgba(54,172,225,.75);margin:16px 0;border-left:4px solid #409eff;border-radius:5px&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:before&#123;content:"❝";top:10px;left:8px;color:#409eff;font-size:20px;line-height:1;font-weight:700;position:absolute;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:after&#123;content:"❞";font-size:20px;position:absolute;right:8px;bottom:0;color:#409eff;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body blockquote>p&#123;color:#fff&#125;.markdown-body ol,.markdown-body ul&#123;padding-left:28px&#125;.markdown-body ol li,.markdown-body ul li&#123;margin-bottom:0;list-style:inherit&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item&#123;list-style:none&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ul,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ul&#123;margin-top:0&#125;.markdown-body ol ol,.markdown-body ol ul,.markdown-body ul ol,.markdown-body ul ul&#123;margin-top:3px&#125;.markdown-body ol li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0">引言</h2>
<p>从创建一个函数开始，了解函数与函数的prototype，以及对象实例三者之间形成的原型链关系。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">一、创建函数</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;&#125;
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(CreateCar);
<span class="hljs-comment">//function CreateCar()&#123;&#125;</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>上面我们创建了一个函数，直接打印函数名，得到的结果是函数本身，好像并没有其他的属性。但实际上，只要函数被创建，函数就会默认的添加一个隐形的prototype属性。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;&#125;
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(CreateCar.prototype);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;constructor: function CreateCar()&#123;&#125;&#125;</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>打印CreateCar.prototype，得到的结果是一个对象，这个对象就是函数的原型对象。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">二、原型对象</h2>
<p>原型对象初始只有一个constructor属性，这个属性的值指向的是函数本身。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;&#125;;
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(CreateCar.prototype.constructor === CreateCar);
<span class="hljs-comment">//true</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>原型对象有什么用呢，现在好像看不出来啥，我们把函数当构造函数用试试：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;&#125;;
<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar();
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;&#125;</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car.varieties)
<span class="hljs-comment">//undefined</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>可以看到，创建出来的是个空对象，并且调用对象没有的属性时返回的是undefined，接着对函数的原型对象prototype一顿操作：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;&#125;;
CreateCar.prototype.varieties = <span class="hljs-string">'小车'</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car1 = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar();
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car1);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;&#125;</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car1.varieties);
<span class="hljs-comment">//小车</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car2 = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar();
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car2);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;&#125;</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car2.varieties);
<span class="hljs-comment">//小车</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>创建的对象car1和car2都是空对象，但是打印它们的varieties都有值且都为'小车'，可以明显发现，函数原型对象prototype上的属性，是函数作为构造函数时创建出的对象所共有的。但为什么car1和car2都是空对象，但是却都可以打印出varieties的值呢？这就和原型链扯上关系了。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">三、原型链</h2>
<p>首先，我们知道一个构造函数创建出来的对象，对象上的属性是由函数体内的语句定义的。这些属性我们可以直接看见并打印，请看如下示例。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params">color</span>)</span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.color = color;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car1 = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar(<span class="hljs-string">'白色'</span>);
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car1);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;color: "白色"&#125;</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car2 = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar(<span class="hljs-string">'黑色'</span>);
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car2);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;color: "黑色"&#125;</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>然后我们已经知道，函数的原型对象上的属性，虽然在对象上看不到，但是会被所有该函数创建出来的对象公用，看如下示例。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params">color</span>)</span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.color = color;
&#125;;
CreateCar.prototype.varieties = <span class="hljs-string">'小车'</span>;
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(CreateCar.prototype);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;varieties: "小车", constructor: function CreateCar(color)&#123;this.color = color;&#125;&#125;</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car1 = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar(<span class="hljs-string">'白色'</span>);
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car1);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;color: "白色"&#125;</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car1.varieties);
<span class="hljs-comment">//小车</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car2 = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar(<span class="hljs-string">'黑色'</span>);
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car2);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;color: "黑色"&#125;</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car2.varieties);
<span class="hljs-comment">//小车</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car2.numberOfwheels);
<span class="hljs-comment">//undefined</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>varieties属性虽然不在对象内展示，但是car1和car2都可以打印出来，这是因为打印varieties的时候，car1和car2都会先在自己身上找varieties，找不到就会去自己构造函数CreateCar的prototype上找（通过__proto__建立关系），找到了就打印出来。而打印car2.numberOfwheels时候，同样car2首先会在自身找，找不到就去构造函数CreateCar的prototype上找，这时候找不到还会继续向上去原生构造函数Object的prototype上找，此时还找不到，就返回undefined了，下面图示这一系列关系。</p>
<p><img alt="1.png" class="lazyload" src="https://p6-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/78ec04214e5f48c98705e44f2048279e~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" data-width="800" data-height="600" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>那如果对象自身属性和原型对象中属性重名会怎样</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">CreateCar</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.varieties = <span class="hljs-string">'大车'</span>
&#125;;
CreateCar.prototype.varieties = <span class="hljs-string">'小车'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> car = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> CreateCar();
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(car);
<span class="hljs-comment">//&#123;varieties: "大车"&#125;</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>可以看到，会优先打印就近找到的属性值。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">总结</h2>
<ol>
<li>每个函数都有一个原型对象prototype。</li>
<li>函数原型对象prototype上的属性会被所有该函数创建出来的对象公用。</li>
<li>调用对象某个值，寻找顺序为：对象自身 → 对象构造函数的prototype → 原生构造函数的prototype → null，这条链即为原型链。</li>
<li>当对象自身属性和构造函数原型对象的属性重名时，会优先打印就近找到的属性值。</li>
</ol></div> <div class="image-viewer-box" data-v-78c9b824><!----></div>  
</div>
